enhanced_description: Rizing is an expert SAP-focused consultancy and solutions provider, dedicated to enabling businesses to achieve a truly intelligent enterprise. They specialize in core functional areas including Human Capital Management (HCM), Enterprise Asset Management (EAM), Consumer Industries (spanning Fashion, Grocery, and Retail), and Geospatial solutions. Rizing leverages leading SAP technologies, notably SAP S/4HANA and the SAP Business Technology Platform, complemented by their own proprietary applications and deep industry-specific experience. Their service offerings encompass strategic advisory, including a partnership with Wipro, and comprehensive transformation initiatives focused on achieving a clean core and agile cloud infrastructure. Rizing aims to unleash human potential through the application of AI, automation, and talent intelligence, while also modernizing HR processes such as payroll, employee engagement, skill analysis, and training. For Enterprise Asset Management, they optimize equipment assessment, prevent downtime, and provide critical cost insights. Rizing serves a broad spectrum of clients, from Fortune 500 companies to small and medium-sized enterprises globally, guiding them through their digital transformation journey.
